data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy Tab S2; Android Nougat 7.0
data.actual_result: The "Add Friend" box pops up, as if you pressed the "Invite Your Friends" button on the All tab (When you have no friends)
data.short_description: The "Invite Your Friends" button is avalible on other tabs where it should not be
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the friends menu - Go to a tab where there are no persons in it (e.g. Suggestions) - Press the empty space (Where the persons are on other tabs)
